entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 7 except 12 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 7 except 12 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the morning. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016
